DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Best Outcome of Therapy Negation Complete Remission Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the best non complete remission disease response to therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Best Outcome of Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Having the most positive qualities._The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having the most positive qualities.:The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.

Concepts.definition: The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Negation Complete Remission Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Negation Disease or Disorder Detection Due To Incomplete Evaluation
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.: The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying.: Caused by or resulting from.: Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
